name: Box Slinger
description:
Fed up with his endless work, Ph1l, a cargo robot with the ability to telekinetically move objects with his hand, decides to rebel against his human masters, tearing through waves of drones along the way!

This game was made in 2 and a half weeks, with the intention of publishing for the Chill Game Jam 2023, but I missed the date by 3 days unfortunately.

Music by hollowelixir ( Twitter: https://twitter.com/gaycatgirlmae)

CONTROLS

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Mouse1: Pick up

Esc: Pause
